<math>\begin{array}{c}\underline{\text{6. Attributes}}\\ 
\\ 
\acute{a},\grave{a},\check{a},\breve{a},\overset{\circ}{a}\\ 
\overrightarrow{a},\tilde{a},\widehat{a},\bar{a},\dot{a},\ddot{a},\stackrel{\cdots }{a}\\ 
\overrightarrow{a},\overrightarrow{\mathrm{abc}},\tilde{a},\tilde{\mathrm{abc}},\widehat{a},\widehat{\mathrm{abc}}\\ 
\overline{a},\overline{\mathrm{abc}},\underline{a},\underline{\mathrm{abc}},a,\mathrm{abc}\\ 
\text{phantom},\text{bold},,\text{Risized to 5 pts},\text{Sans Serif}-\text{Serif}-\text{Fixed}\end{array}</math>
